verses.verse: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3414><s%> which came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> against the Gentiles

לְמִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> Against Egypt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning חֵ֨יל <S%H2428><s%> against the army פַּרְעֹ֤ה נְכוֹ֙ <S%H6549><s%> of Pharaohnecho מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> which was by the river פְּרָ֖ת <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates בְּכַרְכְּמִ֑שׁ <S%H3751><s%> in Carchemish אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִכָּ֗ה <S%H5221><s%> smote נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּר֙ <S%H5019><s%> which Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בִּשְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> year הָֽרְבִיעִ֔ית <S%H7243><s%> in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah
עִרְכ֤וּ <S%H6186><s%> Order מָגֵן֙ <S%H4043><s%> ye the buckler וְצִנָּ֔ה <S%H6793><s%> and shield וּגְשׁ֖וּ <S%H5066><s%> and draw near לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> to battle

אִסְר֣וּ <S%H631><s%> Harness הַסּוּסִ֗ים <S%H5483><s%> the horses וַֽעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> and get up הַפָּ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> ye horsemen וְהִֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <S%H3320><s%> and stand forth בְּכ֥וֹבָעִ֑ים <S%H3553><s%> with [your] helmets מִרְקוּ֙ <S%H4838><s%> furbish הָֽרְמָחִ֔ים <S%H7420><s%> the spears לִבְשׁ֖וּ <S%H3847><s%> [and] put on הַסִּרְיֹנֹֽת׃ <S%H5630><s%> the brigandines

מַדּ֣וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why רָאִ֗יתִי <S%H7200><s%> Wherefore have I seen הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They חַתִּים֮ <S%H2844><s%> them dismayed נְסֹגִ֣ים <S%H5472><s%> [and] turned אָחוֹר֒ <S%H268><s%> back וְגִבּוֹרֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H1368><s%> and their mighty יֻכַּ֔תּוּ <S%H3807><s%> are beaten down וּמָנ֥וֹס <S%H4498><s%> apace נָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> and are fled וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Without הִפְנ֑וּ <S%H6437><s%> and look not back מָג֥וֹר <S%H4032><s%> [for] fear מִסָּבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> [was] round about נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor יָנ֣וּס <S%H5127><s%> flee away הַקַּ֔ל <S%H7031><s%> Let not the swift וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor יִמָּלֵ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> escape הַגִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> nor the mighty man צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <S%H6828><s%> toward the north עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> the river פְּרָ֔ת <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates כָּשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> they shall stumble וְנָפָֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> and fall

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> is this כַּיְאֹ֣ר <S%H2975><s%> as a flood יַֽעֲלֶ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> Who [is] this [that] cometh up כַּנְּהָר֕וֹת <S%H5104><s%> the rivers יִֽתְגָּעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H1607><s%> are moved מֵימָֽיו׃ <S%H4325><s%> whose waters

מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt כַּיְאֹ֣ר <S%H2975><s%> like a flood יַֽעֲלֶ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> riseth up וְכַנְּהָר֖וֹת <S%H5104><s%> like the rivers יִתְגֹּ֣עֲשׁוּ <S%H1607><s%> are moved מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> and [his] waters וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he saith אַֽעֲלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> I will go up אֲכַסֶּה־ <S%H3680><s%> [and] will cover אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth אֹבִ֥ידָה <S%H6><s%> I will destroy עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city וְיֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants בָֽהּ׃

עֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> Come up הַסּוּסִים֙ <S%H5483><s%> ye horses וְהִתְהֹלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> and rage הָרֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> ye chariots וְיֵצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> come forth הַגִּבּוֹרִ֑ים <S%H1368><s%> and let the mighty men כּ֤וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> the Ethiopians וּפוּט֙ <S%H6316><s%> and the Libyans תֹּפְשֵׂ֣י <S%H8610><s%> that handle מָגֵ֔ן <S%H4043><s%> the shield וְלוּדִ֕ים <S%H3866><s%> and the Lydians תֹּפְשֵׂ֖י <S%H8610><s%> that handle דֹּ֥רְכֵי <S%H1869><s%> [and] bend קָֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H7198><s%> the bow

וְֽהַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For this [is] the day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לַאדֹנָ֧י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord יְהוִ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day נְקָמָה֙ <S%H5360><s%> of vengeance לְהִנָּקֵ֣ם <S%H5358><s%> that he may avenge מִצָּרָ֔יו <S%H6862><s%> him of his adversaries וְאָכְלָ֥ה <S%H398><s%> shall devour חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> and the sword וְשָׂ֣בְעָ֔ה <S%H7646><s%> and it shall be satiate וְרָוְתָ֖ה <S%H7301><s%> and made drunk מִדָּמָ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> with their blood כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for זֶ֠בַח <S%H2077><s%> hath a sacrifice לַאדֹנָ֨י <S%H136><s%> for the Lord יְהוִ֧ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country צָפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> in the north אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> by the river פְּרָֽת׃ <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates

עֲלִ֤י <S%H5927><s%> Go up גִלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> into Gilead וּקְחִ֣י <S%H3947><s%> and take צֳרִ֔י <S%H6875><s%> balm בְּתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> O virgin בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לַשָּׁוְא֙ <S%H7723><s%> in vain [הִרְבֵּיתִי כ] (הִרְבֵּ֣ית <S%H7235><s%> abundance ק) רְפֻא֔וֹת <S%H7499><s%> medicines תְּעָלָ֖ה <S%H8585><s%> [for] thou shalt not be cured אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There לָֽךְ׃

שָׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> have heard גוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> The nations קְלוֹנֵ֔ךְ <S%H7036><s%> of thy shame וְצִוְחָתֵ֖ךְ <S%H6682><s%> and thy cry מָלְאָ֣ה <S%H4390><s%> hath filled הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> one גִבּ֤וֹר <S%H1368><s%> for the mighty man בְּגִבּוֹר֙ <S%H1368><s%> against the mighty כָּשָׁ֔לוּ <S%H3782><s%> hath stumbled יַחְדָּ֖יו <S%H3162><s%> together נָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> [and] they are fallen שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> both פ

הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לָב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> should come נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּר֙ <S%H5019><s%> how Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon לְהַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> [and] smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

הַגִּ֤ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> Declare בְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> ye in Egypt וְהַשְׁמִ֣יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> and publish בְמִגְדּ֔וֹל <S%H4024><s%> in Migdol וְהַשְׁמִ֥יעוּ <S%H8085><s%> and publish בְנֹ֖ף <S%H5297><s%> in Noph וּבְתַחְפַּנְחֵ֑ס <S%H8471><s%> and in Tahpanhes אִמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> say הִתְיַצֵּב֙ <S%H3320><s%> ye Stand fast וְהָכֵ֣ן <S%H3559><s%> and prepare לָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָכְלָ֥ה <S%H398><s%> shall devour חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> thee for the sword סְבִיבֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why נִסְחַ֣ף <S%H5502><s%> [men] swept away אַבִּירֶ֑יךָ <S%H47><s%> Why are thy valiant לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not עָמַ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> ? they stood כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> not because the LORD הֲדָפֽוֹ׃ <S%H1920><s%> did drive

הִרְבָּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> He made many כּוֹשֵׁ֑ל <S%H3782><s%> to fall גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Indeed נָפַ֞ל <S%H5307><s%> fell אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> yea one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> upon another וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and they said ק֣וּמָה ׀ <S%H6965><s%> Arise וְנָשֻׁ֣בָה <S%H7725><s%> and let us go again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against עַמֵּ֗נוּ <S%H5971><s%> to our own people וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> and to the land מֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֔נוּ <S%H4138><s%> of our nativity מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword הַיּוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H3238><s%> the oppressing

קָרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> They did cry שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there פַּרְעֹ֤ה <S%H6547><s%> there Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt שָׁא֔וֹן <S%H7588><s%> [is but] a noise הֶעֱבִ֖יר <S%H5674><s%> he hath passed הַמּוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> the time appointed

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [As] I live אָ֙נִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the King יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> Surely כְּתָב֣וֹר <S%H8396><s%> Surely as Tabor בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> [is] among the mountains וּכְכַרְמֶ֖ל <S%H3760><s%> and as Carmel בַּיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> by the sea יָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> [so] shall he come

כְּלֵ֤י <S%H3627><s%> your baggage גוֹלָה֙ <S%H1473><s%> exile עֲשִׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> furnish לָ֔ךְ יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> dwelling בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O thou daughter מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For נֹף֙ <S%H5297><s%> for Noph לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8047><s%> shall be waste תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> will become וְנִצְּתָ֖ה <S%H3341><s%> and desolate מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> else יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> without an inhabitant ס

עֶגְלָ֥ה <S%H5697><s%> heifer יְפֵֽה־ פִיָּ֖ה <S%H3304><s%> [is like] a very fair מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt קֶ֥רֶץ <S%H7171><s%> [but] destruction מִצָּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> cometh בָֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> it cometh out

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Also שְׂכִרֶ֤יהָ <S%H7916><s%> Also her hired men בְקִרְבָּהּ֙ <S%H7130><s%> [are] in the midst כְּעֶגְלֵ֣י <S%H5695><s%> bullocks מַרְבֵּ֔ק <S%H4770><s%> of her like fatted כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> even הֵ֧מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like הִפְנ֛וּ <S%H6437><s%> for they also are turned back נָ֥סוּ <S%H5127><s%> [and] are fled away יַחְדָּ֖יו <S%H3162><s%> together לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָמָ֑דוּ <S%H5975><s%> they did not stand כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> because the day אֵידָ֛ם <S%H343><s%> of their calamity בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> was come עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> upon עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> upon them [and] the time פְּקֻדָּתָֽם׃ <S%H6486><s%> of their visitation

קוֹלָ֖הּ <S%H6963><s%> The voice כַּנָּחָ֣שׁ <S%H5175><s%> like a serpent יֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> moves כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> like בְחַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> with an army יֵלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> move וּבְקַרְדֻּמּוֹת֙ <S%H7134><s%> against her with axes בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come לָ֔הּ כְּחֹטְבֵ֖י <S%H2404><s%> as hewers עֵצִֽים׃ <S%H6086><s%> of wood

כָּרְת֤וּ <S%H3772><s%> They shall cut down יַעְרָהּ֙ <S%H3293><s%> her forest נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> Surely לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will no יֵֽחָקֵ֑ר <S%H2713><s%> though it cannot be searched כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> though רַבּוּ֙ <S%H7231><s%> because they are more מֵֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <S%H697><s%> than the grasshoppers וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> without לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like מִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> number

הֹבִ֖ישָׁה <S%H3001><s%> shall be confounded בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> The daughter מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt נִתְּנָ֖ה <S%H5414><s%> she shall be delivered בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> of the people צָפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> of the north

אַ֠תָּה <S%H859><s%> you אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֞א <S%H3372><s%> Fear עַבְדִּ֤י <S%H5650><s%> my servant יַֽעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> thou not O Jacob נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> for אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶעֱשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> for I [am] with thee for I will make כָלָ֜ה <S%H3617><s%> a full end בְּכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַגּוֹיִ֣ם ׀ <S%H1471><s%> of all the nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> I הִדַּחְתִּ֣יךָ <S%H5080><s%> whither I have driven שָׁ֗מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it וְאֹֽתְךָ֙ <S%H853><s%> לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> thee but I will not make כָלָ֔ה <S%H3617><s%> a full end וְיִסַּרְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3256><s%> of thee but correct לַמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> thee in measure וְנַקֵּ֖ה <S%H5352><s%> yet will I not leave thee wholly לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no אֲנַקֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H5352><s%> unpunished ס
